io.spine.web.firebase.rest

Class RemoteDatabaseClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.web.firebase.rest.RemoteDatabaseClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FirebaseClient

    public final class RemoteDatabaseClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements FirebaseClient
    A FirebaseClient which operates via the Firebase REST API and the Java Admin SDK.

    The client uses the Java Firebase Admin SDK for subscribing to events of a given database node. The API exposes the ChildEventListener so that the caller may build more complex "nested" subscriptions without a need to re-fetch database references.

    For all the other operations, the client uses the Firebase REST API as described in the documentation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      A builder for the RemoteDatabaseClient instances.

    • Method Detail

      • fetchNode

        public java.util.Optional<NodeValue> fetchNode(io.spine.web.firebase.NodePath nodePath)
        Description copied from interface: FirebaseClient
        Retrieves the value of the specified Firebase database node.

        The null value (i.e. the node is not present in the database) is returned as Optional.empty().

        Specified by:
        fetchNode in interface FirebaseClient
        Parameters:
        nodePath - the path to the requested node in the database
        Returns:
        the node value or empty Optional if the node is not present in the database

        Description copied from interface: FirebaseClient
        Subscribes to the child events of the given node.
        Specified by:
        subscribeTo in interface FirebaseClient
        Parameters:

        listener - the callbacks invoked on child events

      • create

        public void create(io.spine.web.firebase.NodePath nodePath,
                   NodeValue value)
        Description copied from interface: FirebaseClient
        Writes the specified value to the Firebase database node.

        If the node exists, the value is overridden.

        Specified by:
        create in interface FirebaseClient
        Parameters:
        nodePath - the path to the node in the Firebase database
        value - the value to write

      • update

        public void update(io.spine.web.firebase.NodePath nodePath,
                   NodeValue value)
        Description copied from interface: FirebaseClient
        Merges the specified value to the Firebase database node.

        If the node doesn't exist, it is created with the given value.

        If the node exists, the value entries are added to the node children overwriting common ones if present.

        Specified by:
        update in interface FirebaseClient
        Parameters:
        nodePath - the path to the node in the Firebase database
        value - the value to merge

      • delete

        public void delete(io.spine.web.firebase.NodePath nodePath)
        Description copied from interface: FirebaseClient
        Deletes the node under the given path.

        Does nothing if the node does not exist.

        Specified by:
        delete in interface FirebaseClient
        Parameters:
        nodePath - the path to the node to delete
